issue.title: tvtropes.org
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Main/Media](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftvtropes.org%2Fpmwiki%2Fpmwiki.php%2FMain%2FMedia) ### Comment > This is a new adblocker detector that I noticed today. I'm on the free plan with everything enabled that I can enable, all I have to do is browse the site to get this. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/tou4zfq3yn4g804w400o04ok0o8c88c7l59pj5lqfc.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.12 System version: | `iOS 26.0.1` License type: | free DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection Other extensions used: | `AdBlock Pro, Hush, Amplosion`

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://tvtropes.org/pmwiki/pmwiki.php/Series/UltraGalaxyFightTheDestinedCrossroad](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftvtropes.org%2Fpmwiki%2Fpmwiki.php%2FSeries%2FUltraGalaxyFightTheDestinedCrossroad) ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/f2ba8o0csy04gwwk88sgwsgkwgs4gkw12xdfh453is.png?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Mac v2.17.3.2020 release System version: | `MacOS 26.0.1 (Build 25A362)` Browser: | Safari Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | server: `System`
filters: `AdGuard DNS filter` Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base Browsing Security: | enabled Browsing Security statistics: | disabled Userscripts: | `AdGuard Extra (url: https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js)` Userstyles: | disabled Referrer: | [https://tvtropes.org/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Ftvtropes.org%2F) ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?product_type=mac&product_version=2.17.3.2020+release&system_version=MacOS+26.0.1+%28Build+25A362%29&browser=safari&filters=2&dns_servers=System&userscripts=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28url%253A%2520https%253A%252F%252Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%252Frelease%252Fadguard-extra%252F1.0%252Fadguard-extra.user.js%29&dns.filters=AdGuard%2520DNS%2520filter&dns.filters_enabled=true&dns.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&stealth.enabled=false&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.push=true&stealth.location=true&stealth.java=true&stealth.strip_url=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.x_client=true&stealth.dpi=false&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=false&referrer=https%253A%252F%252Ftvtropes.org%252F&scheme_version=3&adblocking.enabled=true&dns.timeout=2000)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.animeunity.so/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.animeunity.so%2F) ### Comment > The problem is simple just the guard is not blocking ads on the site that i wrote > > and pls can you make the ticket a little bit short? like 6 phase are heavy, but anyways yeah it’s just that tnx and have a good day ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/1mn7n0s3bhwgcc0o8c0c8ook0ookow416xcs4fork4.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for iOS v4.5.14 License type: | paid Advanced protection: | enabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:
AdGuard Base,
AdGuard Mobile Ads

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Language-specific:
EasyList Italy Other extensions used: | `None`
